components.name: Screengrab
components.description: A component responsible for capturing screenshots on Android devices using different strategies.

components.name: ScreenshotStrategy
components.description: An interface defining the method for taking screenshots, implemented by various strategies like DecorViewScreenshotStrategy and UiAutomatorScreenshotStrategy.

components.name: FileWritingScreenshotCallback
components.description: Handles the saving of captured screenshots to the file system, managing file paths and directories.

data_flows.description: Screengrab invokes the takeScreenshot method from the ScreenshotStrategy interface to capture screenshots using the selected strategy.
Once a screenshot is captured, the ScreenshotStrategy passes the image data to FileWritingScreenshotCallback for saving.

trust_boundaries.name: Application Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the fastlane application and the underlying operating system resources.
